info.description: This is an Air New Zealand - Technology Platform eXperience(TPX) offering. The platform exposes REST service for communication, supporting channels like eMail, SMS and Chats(user to user & user to group) in the future.
info.title: bizcommserv

tags.name: eMails Service
tags.description: Service for posting and fetching of eMails of a user.

post.description: The endpoint is invoked for sending an eMail to one or more users.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: An identity object that uniquely authorises the user in the platform.

parameters.name: Correlation_Id
parameters.description: An identity object that identifies Applications. This is used to convey application identity metadata.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Details for creating Liquidation Damages claim.

200.description: Successful response. Returns existing Liquidated Damage if Liquidated Damage claim is already under process for same account number / case combination.

201.description: Successful response. New Liquidated Damage created.

403.description: Authorization failed due to insufficient permissions.

422.description: The requested action could not be performed, semantically incorrect, or failed business validation.

500.description: An internal server error has occurred.

get.summary: Fetch a list of eMails belonging to the user. The same API endpoint is used for fetching the eMails RECEIVED, SENT, DRAFT and OUTBOX.
get.description: Fetch list of messages which matches request criteria.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: An identity object that uniquely authorises the user in the platform.

parameters.name: Correlation_Id
parameters.description: An identity object that identifies Applications. This is used to convey application identity metadata.

parameters.name: mailbox
parameters.description: The eMail mailbox type for fetching. Legal status are SENT, INBOX, DRAFT, OUTBOX.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Maximum number of items in the response.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Fields to sort by time in descending order.

parameters.name: total_required
parameters.description: Whether total items and pages are required.

200.description: Successful response. Returns a list of eMails.

400.description: Bad request, some invalid filter criteria passed.

403.description: Authorization failed due to insufficient permissions.
